artist: Artist: Kawase Hasui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: landscape; figure with yellow umbrella on a bridge at center; slanted falling rain; grass and foliage bent from wind and rain; grey sky
inscription: left margin: 昭和七年八月作 {Shōwa shichinen hachigatsu saku} (made in August 1932)
markings: LRC, red round artist\'s seal: 川セ {Kawase} | LRC, publisher seal D: 版権所有　渡邊庄三郎 {hanken shoyū Watanabe Shōzaburō} (copyright Watanabe Shōzaburō)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text: Imai Bridge, spanning the Edo River, connects Tokyo and Chiba Prefecture. The old wooden bridge has been replaced; the current bridge dates from 1979.
title: Evening Shower at Imai Bridge
